name: Mitigation Playbook for Command and Scripting Interpreter Exploitation
description: This playbook mitigates the exploitation of a vulnerable web application that allowed arbitrary execution of Python script commands, leading to potential data exfiltration.

action--59c02f78-ad97-4545-b926-3fcd635e.name: Terminate unauthorized Python processes
action--59c02f78-ad97-4545-b926-3fcd635e.description: Terminate all unauthorized Python processes that could be executing on the victim server.

while-condition--7c2b3c63-b6a3-45ae-83b8.name: Check for unauthorized Python processes
while-condition--7c2b3c63-b6a3-45ae-83b8.description: Repeat the action every minute until no unauthorized Python processes are found.

action--178c4f1c-bcfe-4be4-93b2-51bc3f7d.name: Block all outbound connections to suspicious IPs
action--178c4f1c-bcfe-4be4-93b2-51bc3f7d.description: Block outbound connections to IPs identified as suspicious.

action--b678583e-80e9-4839-9f58-51d52bce.name: Conduct a root cause analysis
action--b678583e-80e9-4839-9f58-51d52bce.description: Investigate web application logs for initial compromise vector, if the unauthorized access vector is obscure.

commands.command: echo 'Investigate web application logs for initial compromise vector'

action--e1d22538-23b2-4a27-b63c-f8aa9a2e.name: Patch vulnerable software
action--e1d22538-23b2-4a27-b63c-f8aa9a2e.description: Update and patch the vulnerable software to prevent future exploitation.

action--d741182b-a4c1-4c89-bd17-08b928c4.name: Review and restrict script execution privileges
action--d741182b-a4c1-4c89-bd17-08b928c4.description: Ensure that script execution privileges are reviewed to prevent unauthorized execution of scripts.
